jobsJson.text: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst - BI Driver
jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Driver Team (Driver Operations & Platform Team) at Gojek focuses on continuously delivering value to our 2W and 4W driver partners through creating frictionless driver experience in using our platform, providing competitive source of income, inspiring them to provide a high and differentiated level of service, and protecting them from fraudulent events.

As a Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst you will be supporting the Driver Team in monitoring, planning, and analyzing business performance metrics. You will be relied upon to prepare an analysis plan and conduct the analysis, including defining problem statements, conducting exploratory data analysis, defining key metrics, generating insights, and coming up with a set of recommendations. You will also be expected to be able to translate analytics requirements into a dashboard or reporting mechanism to influence data-driven decision making among Driver Team’s stakeholders. This position requires strong leadership, communication, and relationship skills as well as strong problem solving and analytical skills. 

Success in this role is predicated on understanding Driver Team’s business objectives and operations at a level of detail that enables the analyst to identify and address critical issues, and aligning deliverables according to Driver Team’s stakeholders priorities and requirements.
jobsJson.description:
Driver Team (Driver Operations & Platform Team) at Gojek focuses on continuously delivering value to our 2W and 4W driver partners through creating frictionless driver experience in using our platform, providing competitive source of income, inspiring them to provide a high and differentiated level of service, and protecting them from fraudulent events.

As a Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst you will be supporting the Driver Team in monitoring, planning, and analyzing business performance metrics. You will be relied upon to prepare an analysis plan and conduct the analysis, including defining problem statements, conducting exploratory data analysis, defining key metrics, generating insights, and coming up with a set of recommendations. You will also be expected to be able to translate analytics requirements into a dashboard or reporting mechanism to influence data-driven decision making among Driver Team’s stakeholders. This position requires strong leadership, communication, and relationship skills as well as strong problem solving and analytical skills. 

Success in this role is predicated on understanding Driver Team’s business objectives and operations at a level of detail that enables the analyst to identify and address critical issues, and aligning deliverables according to Driver Team’s stakeholders priorities and requirements.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Become a ‘thinking partner’ in problem-solving for business and product stakeholders, by providing a data-driven approach element to the collaboration
  • Develops clear and well-structured analytical plans and analyzes relevant datasets to derive insights and recommendations to influence data-driven decision
  • Design and develop dashboard or reporting mechanism to enable business performance monitoring and influence data-driven decision
  • Writes SQL scripts to run and derive reports from Data Warehouse
  • Prepare and present analysis result to business and product stakeholders
  • Deeply understand and articulate the complexity of Gojek business operations and competitive landscape to influence senior-level decision making across the company through data-driven approaches
  • Provide feedback and review other analyst’s work

• Minimum 5 years experience in Business Intelligence, Analytics, or related functions with strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Mastery of SQL and experience with BI reporting (i.e. Tableau, Metabase) and databases (dimensional and relational)Having R/Python Programming skill and experience is preferred
  • Comfortable working both independently with minimal guidance and in a team setting
  • Excellent in communication and good at collaborative working
